snippet.title: ‘Where Wh..? ’ STEAM NEXT FEST Demo Release!
snippet.description:
Hello everyone! 
We are Pita Game Studio, a 2-player indie game studio from Shanghai. We have 2 games online at the moment, and this time we are bringing you our newest game ‘Where Wh..? ’, a puzzle finding game that has only been updated recently!
The demo version has been launched on Steam, participating in the October New Products Festival, friends can download and play at any time, if you are interested, welcome to add a wish list!
Tips1. Demo version for the first two chapters of the content, play progress can be inherited in the official version! (under the same device)
Tips2. The mobile version is currently available on both Taptap and Appstore, and the experience is the same!
Tips3. The official version is expected to be released on 24th October, no pigeonholing, no running, 100 levels of the full game to provide play.
Search for ‘Where’ or ‘Where Demo’ on Steam to play the game.
No capital business self-produced ヽ( o・ェ・)ノ, one-click trifecta! Follow us! We'll be working on a new game soon, and we'll be waiting for you to play it.
